member.name: M:Android_Native_Demonstration.Init.Builder_Construct(Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.MauiAppBuilder)
member.summary: Construct the builder to initialize the application with the necessary plugins

member.name: M:Android_Native_Demonstration.Utils.Storage.Save_ImageSource_To_Directory(System.String,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ImageSource)
member.summary:
Save a ImageSource into a directory in device storage and, the directory needs to contain the file name return a string containing the result
permission_denied = the device is not allowed to save files in storage
operational_system_incompatible = the actual OS running is not compatible
wrong_directory_type = directory problem, probably a character incompatible
success = sucessfully saved the file in device

member.name: M:Android_Native_Demonstration.Utils.Storage.Create_Directory(System.String)
member.summary:
Creates the directory in device
You cannot place dots "." in directory only place in file extensions!!!

member.name: M:Android_Native_Demonstration.Utils.Storage.Get_Image_Bytes_From_ImageSource(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ImageSource)
member.summary: Converts the ImageSource into Bytes, returns null if any error occurs
